headline: Equifax Inc. stock underperforms Monday when compared to competitors
summary: Equifax Inc. stock underperforms Monday when compared to competitors

headline: 3 Reasons to Sell EFX and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the last six months, Equifax’s shares have sunk to $226.96, producing a disappointing 12.9% loss - a stark contrast to the S&P 500’s 10.4% gain. This may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
